sourcesContent:
Have a delicious food at available restaurants !!

{{item.itemName}}

Price: {{item.itemPrice}}
Rating: {{item.itemRating}}

{{restaurant.restaurantName}}

Location: {{restaurant.location}}
Rating: {{restaurant.rating}}

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { RestaurantServiceService } from '../service/restaurant-service.service'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LoginService } from '../service/login.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-restaurant-view', templateUrl: './restaurant-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./restaurant-view.component.css'] }) export class RestaurantViewComponent { constructor(private service:RestaurantServiceService,private route:Router,private activatedRoute:ActivatedRoute,private login:LoginService){ } searchedItems:any=[]; searchedRestaurants:any=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getAllRestaurant().subscribe( response=>{ this.restaurants=response; }, error=>{ alert("error!!!!"); } ) this.login.searchElement.subscribe(seachelement=>{ this.onSearchTextChanged(seachelement); }) } getItems(id:number) { this.service.getId(id); this.route.navigateByUrl('/viewItem'); } @Input('restaurants') restaurants:any = []; getLocation(location:any){ this.getLocation(location); this.service.getRestaurantByLocation(location).subscribe( (response: Object) => { const restaurantArray = response as any[]; if(location && location !== ''){ this.restaurants = restaurantArray.filter((restaurant:any) => restaurant.location === location); } else { this.restaurants = restaurantArray; console.log(restaurantArray); } }, error=>{ alert("error!!!!"); } ) } onSearchTextChanged(searchText:string) { if (searchText && searchText.trim() !== '') { this.searchedItems = []; this.restaurants.forEach((restaurant: any) => { restaurant.items.forEach((item: any) => { if (item.itemName.toLowerCase().includes(searchText.toLowerCase())) { this.searchedItems.push(item); } }); }); } else { this.ngOnInit() this.searchedItems = []; } if(searchText || searchText !== ''){ this.restaurants=this.restaurants.filter((restaurant:any)=>{ return restaurant.restaurantName.toLowerCase().includes(searchText.toLowerCase()); }); }else{ this.ngOnInit() } console.log(this.searchedItems); console.log(this.restaurants); } }
